datafield.subfield: Huang jin cao yuan : Zhongguo gu dai bei fang you mu min zu wen wu zhan
Zhongguo gu dai bei fang you mu min zu wen wu /
Hubei Sheng bo wu guan bian = Golden grassland : cultural relics of northern ethnic groups in ancient China / edited by Hubei Provincial Museum.
Zhongguo gu dai bei fang you mu min zu wen wu
cultural relics of northern ethnic groups in ancient China
Exhibition held January 25-March 17, 2013 at Hubei Provincial Museum.

"Ben shu wei Nei Menggu bo wu yuan "huang jin cao yuan - Zhongguo gu dai bei fang you mu min zu wen wu" zai Hubei Sheng bo wu guan de zhan lan tu lu. zuo wei Zhongguo gu dai bei fang you mu min zu fan yan sheng xi de zhong yao wu tai, gu wang jin lai, jian zhu shi cheng de bei fang min zu xian hou you dong hu, Xiongnu, Xianbei, Tujue, Qidan, Menggu deng, ta men ci di xiang cheng, gong tong chuang zao le hui huang can lan de cao yuan wen ming, gai tu lu ji yi bu tong li shi shi qi de you mu min zu wei dan yuan, zai xian le ta men chuang zao de li shi he wen ming"--From publisher.
黄金草原 : 中国古代北方游牧民族文物展
中国古代北方游牧民族文物 /
湖北省博物馆编 = Golden grassland : cultural relics of northern ethnic groups in ancient China / edited by Hubei Provincial Museum.
中国古代北方游牧民族文物
"本书为内蒙古博物院"'黄金草原-中国古代北方游牧民族文物'在湖北省博物馆的展览图录. 作为中国古代北方游牧民族繁衍生息的重要舞台, 古往今来, 见诸史乘的北方民族先后有东胡、匈奴、鲜卑、突厥、契丹、蒙古等, 它们次第相承, 共同创造了辉煌灿烂的草原文明, 该图录即以不同历史时期的游牧民族为单元, 再现了他们创造的历史和文明"--From publisher.

Zhonghua wen ming qi yuan zhan
Tracing the source of the Liaohe river civilization :
the formative period of Chinese civilization

Ben shu gong fen san ge dan yuan, yi zhuan ti xing shi zhan shi yi Hongshan wen hua wei he xin de Liao He liu yu zao qi wen ming de qi yuan he fa zhan, shi Zhong hua wen ming qi yuan duo yuan xing de sheng dong ti xian, ye fan ying chu Liao He liu yu zai Zhong hua wen ming qi yuan guo cheng zhong de zhong yao di wei he zuo yong.
Guo jia ke xue ji shu bu.
中华文明起源展 = Tracing the source of the Liaohe river civilization : the formative period of Chinese civilization /
国家文物局, 中华人民共和国科学技术部, 辽宁省人民政府编.
本书共分三个单元，以专题的形式展示以红山文化为核心的辽河流域早期文明的起源和发展，是中华文明起源多源性的生动体现，也反映出辽河流域在中华文明起源过程中的重要地位和作用。

datafield.subfield: Huai'an Yunhe Cun Zhan guo mu /
Huai'an Shi bo wu guan bian zhu.

"Huai'an Yunhe Cun Zhanguo mu" yi san ji de xing shi hui gu le Yunhe Cun Zhanguo mu fa ju de quan bu guo cheng, gong ji tiao mu 23 li, han gai kao gu fa xian, mu zang xing zhi, sui zang qi wu, fa jue hua xu, xue shu tan tao deng nei rong, bing fu yi tu biao, jin liang wei du zhi ti gong xiang shi de kao gu zi liao. Ling hui lu fa jue bao gao, kao gu tong xun, zhuan ti yan jiu, wen wu xiu fu bao hu deng 6 pian wen zhang.
《淮安运河村战国墓》以散记的形式回顾了运河村战国墓发掘的全部过程，共计条目23例，涵盖考古发现、墓葬形制、随葬器物、发掘花絮、学术探讨等内容，并附以图表，尽量为读者提供翔实的考古资料。另汇录发掘报告、考古通讯、专题研究、文物修复保护等6篇文章。

datafield.subfield: Yungang shi ku kong jian yi shu /
Yungang shi ku kong jian yi shu

Ben shu cong da shi jue yi shu de jiao du, hong guan de kan Yungang shi ku, zhu yao guan zhu qi shi jue yi shu de zhong yao jia zhi, fen xi Yungang shi ku de zheng ti jian zhu xing shi, mei ge dong ku kong jian de jian zhu jie gou, diao su yu jian zhu de jie he, fen xi qi li yong zhuang shi yi shu gui lü he te dian, yi diao su wei shou duan gou jian de te shu fo jiao jian zhu kong jian. Yungang shi ku zuo wei fo jiao jian zhu zai nei rong shang ji da di xuan chuan he hong yang liao fo fa, zai jian zhu xing shi shang chuang xin liao fo jiao yi shu de shen mi kong jian, chuang zao liao kong jian yi shu de hui huang, zhi jin ying xiang ju da.
本书从大视觉艺术的角度, 宏观地看云冈石窟, 主要关注其视觉艺术的重要价值, 分析云冈石窟的整体建筑形式, 每个洞窟空间的建筑结构, 雕塑与建筑的结合, 分析其利用装饰艺术规律和特点, 以雕塑为手段构建的特殊佛教建筑空间. 云冈石窟作为佛教建筑在内容上极大地宣传和弘扬了佛法, 在建筑形式上创新了佛教艺术的神秘空间, 创造了空间艺术的辉煌, 至今影响巨大.

datafield.subfield: Hebei kao gu zhong yao fa xian, 1949-2009 /
Hebei Sheng wen wu yan jiu suo bian zhu.

Ben shu hui ji le Hebei Sheng cong 1949 nian dao 2009 nian kao gu de zhong yao shou huo, she ji zhong yao kao gu fa xian 107 ge. Ben shu fen wei Jiu shi qi shi dai, Xin shi qi shi dai, Xia Shang Zhou, Qin Han, Wei Jin Nan Bei chao, Sui Tang Wu dai, Song Liao Jin Yuan Ming qi ge jie duan, mei ge jie duan fen zong shu he zhong dian yi zhi jie shao. Ji shi yan jiu Hebei Diqu li shi, kao go de zhong yao can kao zi liao, you shi Hebei Sheng zhong yao wen wu de hui bian, ju you xin shang he xue shu jie zhi.
Hebei Sheng wen wu yan jiu suo.
河北省文物研究所编著.
本书汇集了河北省从1949年到2009年考古的重要收获, 涉及重要考古发现107个. 本书分为旧石器时代, 新石器时代, 夏商周, 秦汉, 魏晋北朝, 隋唐五代, 宋辽金元明七个阶段, 每个阶段分综述和重点遗址介绍. 既是研究河北地区历史,考古的重要参考资料,又是河北省重要文物的汇编, 具有欣赏和学术价值.

Beijing wen wu yu kao gu xi lie cong shu

Ben shu guan yu Beijing Shi Pinggu Qu Xigu he dao zhi li gong cheng mu di he Xixingyuan mu di de kao gu fa jue bao gao. Xinggu he dao zhi li gong cheng mu di shi 2006 nian 6-7 yue pei he Xinggu kai fa qu he dao zhi li gong cheng ji fang hong shui qu jian she er jing xing fa jue de, gong qing li Han dai mu zang 16 zuo, chu to tong, tie, shi, tao qi deng wen wu 200 yu jian. Xixingyuan mu di shi 2006 nian 3-4 yu wei pei he Beishalu gong cheng er fa xian de, gong you Han dai mu zang 6 zuo, chu tu tong, tao qi deng wen wu 150 yu jian. Zhe xie mu zang de shi dai cong Xi Han shi qi yuan xu zhi Dong Han shi qi, mu zang xing zhi ji sui zang pin ju you dian xing de Han dai te zheng, shi yan jiu Pinggu Diqu Han dai zang su, she hui jie gou ji she hui jing ji fa zhan qing kuang de zhong yao kao gu zi liao.
Beijing Shi wen wu yan jiu suo.
北京市文物研究所编著.
北京文物与考古系列丛书

本书是关于北京市平谷区兴谷河道治理工程墓地和西杏园墓地的考古发掘报告。兴谷河道治理工程墓地是2006年6-7月配合兴谷开发区河道治理工程暨防洪水渠建设而进行发掘的，共清理汉代墓葬16座，出土铜、铁、石、陶器等文物200余件。西杏园墓地是2006年3-4月为配合北山路工程而发现的，共有汉代墓葬6座，出土铜、陶器等文物150余件。这些墓葬的时代从西汉时期延续至东汉时期，墓葬形制及随葬品具有典型的汉代特征，是研究平谷地区汉代葬俗、社会结构及社会经济发展情况的重要考古资料。
Beijing wen wu yu kao gu xi lie cong shu.
北京文物与考古系列丛书.

datafield.subfield: Wan Tang Qian Kuan fu fu mu /
Zhejiang Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo ... [et al.] bian zhu.
Added title page also in English:
Qian Kuan couple tombs in late Tang

Qian Kuan Heshui Qiu shi xi Wu dai shi qi Wu Yue guo wang Qian Liu zhi fu mu. Qian Kuang fu fu mu wei yu Zhejiang Sheng Lian'an Shi Jingcheng jie dao Xishu Cun Mingtang Shan. Liang mu wei yi xue tong feng he zang mu, mu zang jun wei qian hou shuang shi, duo er shi, duo hu men, duo bi kan, hou shi liang bi xie xiang nei shou de chuan xing mu zang, shi wan Tang shi qi Wu Yue di qu gui zu shi yong de mu zang xing zhi. Liang mu sui zang pin feng fu, qi zhong you yi "Guan" yu "Xin guan" kuan bai ci qi he Yue yao he cai yun wen mi se ci qi wei zheng gui.
Zhejiang Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo.
浙江省文物考古研究所 ... [et al.]编著.
钱宽和水邱氏系五代时期吴越国王钱鏐之父母. 钱宽夫妇墓位于浙江省临安市锦城街道西墅村明堂山. 两墓为异穴同封合葬墓, 墓葬均为前后双室、多耳室、多壼门、多壁龛、后室两壁斜向内收的船形墓葬, 是晚唐时期吴越地区贵族使用的墓葬形制. 两墓随葬品丰富, 其中尤以"官"与"新官"款白瓷器和越窑褐彩云纹秘色瓷器为珍贵.
浙江省文物考古研究所.

datafield.subfield: Chongqing ku qu kao gu bao gao ji :
Chongqing Shi wen wu ju, Chongqing Shi yi min ju bian.
Collections of reports on the archaeological excavation in the Three Gorges Dam, Chongqing in 2002
Chang Jiang Sanxia gong cheng wen wu bao hu xiang mu bao gao. Jia zhong =
Reports on the cultural relics conservation in the Three Gorges Dam Project A (annual report) ;

Ben shu shou lu le Sanxia wen wu bao hu gong cheng Chongqing ku qu 2002 nian du tie ye kao gu bao gao ji qian nian du de bu fen kao gu bao gao gong ji 75 pian. Kao gu fa jue biao ming, Chang Jiang Sanxian di qu zi gu yi lai jiu shi Zhong hua min zu de wen hua fa yuan di he zhong yao de wu tai, bao cun le zi jiu shi qi shi dai zhi Ming Qing de ge zhong wen wu gu ji, shi wen hua jiao liu de zhong yao tong dao. Ben shu shi Sanxia wen wu bao hu gong cheng Chongqing ku qu de di wu bu ke xue fa jue de cheng guo bao gao ji, dui yan jiu Sanxia di qu gu dai li shi wen hua ti gong le zhong yao de shi wu zi liao.
重庆市文物局, 重庆市移民局编.
长江三峡工程文物保护项目报告. 甲种 =
Reports on the cultural relics conservation in the Three Gorges Dam Project A (annual report) ;
本书收录了三峡文物保护工程重庆库区2002年度田野考古报告及之前年度的部分考古报告共计75篇. 考古发掘表明, 长江三峡地区自古以来就是中华民族的文化发源地和重要的舞台, 保存了自旧石器时代至明清的各种文物古迹, 是文化交流的重要通道. 本书是三峡文物保护工程重庆库区的第五部科学发掘的成果报告集, 对研究三峡地区古代历史文化提供了重要的实物资料.
Chang Jiang San Xia gong cheng wen wu bao hu xiang mu bao gao.
长江三峡工程文物保护项目报告.

Zhongguo wen zi bo wu guan bian.

Ben shu shi Zhongguo wen zi bo wu guan bian xie de tu ce, dui Zhongguo wen zi bo wu guan jin xing le quan mian de jie shao, nei rong she ji le guan cang wen wu, chang guan chen lie, xue shu huo dong, an bao fu wu deng, Zhong Ying wen dui zhao, shi ren men dui zhe zuo xin jian de bo wu guan neng you yi ge duo fang mian de liao jie.
Zhongguo wen zi bo wu guan.
本书是由中国文字博物馆编写的图册, 对中国文字博物馆进行了全面的介绍, 内容涉及了馆藏文物, 场馆陈列, 学术活动, 安保服务等, 中英文对照, 使人们对这座新建的博物馆能有一个多方面的了解.

datafield.subfield: Henan zao qi ke hua fu hao yan jiu /
Yuan Guangkuo, Ma Baochun, Song Guoding zhu.
Shou du shi fan da xue shi xue cong shu

Ben shu zai quan mian shou ji mu qian suo jian Henan chu tu xin shi qi shi dai zhi Shang dai zao qi qi wu kee hua fu hao zi liao de ji chu shang, li yong kao gu xue, li shi xue, gu wen zi xue, fu hao xue, min zu xue, tu xiang xue deng zhu duo xue ke de li lun he yan jiu fang fa, chu bu tan tao le zhe yi shi qi yi Henan wei zhu tu de Zhongyuan Diqu chu tu qi wu ke hua fu hao de ding ming, fen lei ji qi yu han zi qi yuan de guan xi wen ti. Dui yi xie te shu de ke hua fu hao ye cong ge ge jiao du jin xing le jiao wei shen ru de tan tao. Fa xian wan Shang zhi qian Henan Diqu chu tu qi wu ke hu fu hao de gou cheng ji you xian duan gou jiao lei fu hao, ye you xian tiao lei xing fu hao, er zhe shi ping xing fa zhan de. Ta men yu han zi zai xing ti shang you yi ding de lian xi.
河南早期刻画符号研究 /
袁广阔, 马保春, 宋国定著.
首都师范大学史学丛书

本书在全面收集目前所见河南出土新石器时代至商代早期器物刻画符号资料的基础上，利用考古学、历史学、古文字学、符号学、民族学、图像学等诸多学科的理论和研究方法，初步探讨了这一时期以河南为主体的中原地区出土器物刻画符号的定名、分类及其与汉字起源的关系等问题。对一些特殊的刻画符号也从各个角度进行了较为深入的探讨。发现晚商之前河南地区出土器物刻画符号的构成既有线段构架类符号，也有线条造型类符号，二者是平行发展的。它们与汉字在形体上有一定的联系。
Shou du shi fan da xue shi xue cong shu.
首都师范大学史学丛书.

Бейсенов = Материалы международной научной конференции, "Археология Казахстана в эпоху независимости : итоги, перспективы" : освященной 20-летию независимости Республики Казахстан и 20-летию Института археологии им. datafield.subfield: settlement and territory at Old Babylonian Alalah /
Settlement and territory at Old Babylonian Alalah
Culture and history of the ancient Near East,

"Legal texts recording the purchase or exchange of entire settlements are among the most important cuneiform tablets discovered at Old Babylonian/Middle Bronze Age (Level VII) Alalah. Following the Man of Yamhad is the first book-length study of these legal texts and the socio-economic practice that they document. The author explores the nature of the alienated settlements, the rights enjoyed by their owners, the underlying system of land tenure, and the larger political context in which the transactions occurred. The study is supported by extensive collations and up-to-date editions of relevant legal and administrative texts. Its conclusions will be of interest to anyone working on the history, society, and economy of the Bronze Age Near East"--Provided by publisher.

Introduction: Aims of the book; Land tenure; Terminology; The responsibilities of owning a settlement; Previous research on owning settlements; What was a settlement?; What rights did the owner of a settlement enjoy?; Excursus: The word teqnitum; Structure of the book -- Tablets and archives -- Case studies -- L'affaire d'Alahtum -- Conditions of tenure -- Yarim-Lim's domain -- Conclusion: Summary and synthesis; Interpretive frameworks; A network of nodes and corridors?; A province or a personal estate?; An "amorite" polity? -- Appendix 1: The chronology of Level VII Alalah -- Appendix 2: Data sets -- Appendix 3: Editions of translated Level VII texts.
In English, texts in romanized Akkadian.
Culture and history of the ancient Near East ;

marc:datafield.marc:subfield: Institute for the Study of the Ancient World,

datafield.subfield: Cities that shaped the ancient world /

Today we take living in cities, with all their attractions and annoyances, for granted. But when did humans first come together to live in large groups, creating an urban landscape? What were these places like to inhabit? More than simply a history of ancient cities, this volume also reveals the art and architecture created by our ancestors, and provides a fascinating exploration of the origins of urbanism, politics, culture, and human interaction. Arranged geographically into five sections, Cities That Shaped the Ancient World takes a global view, beginning in the Near East with the earliest cities such as Ur and Babylon, Troy and Jerusalem. In Africa, the great cities of Ancient Egypt arose, such as Thebes and Amarna. Glorious European metropolises, including Athens and Rome, ringed the Mediterranean, but also stretched to Trier on the turbulent frontier of the Roman Empire. Asia had bustling commercial centers such as Mohenjodaro and Xianyang, while in the Americas the Mesoamerican and Peruvian cultures stamped their presence on the landscape, creating massive structures and extensive urban settlements in the deep jungles and high mountain ranges, including Caral and Teotihuacan. A team of expert historians and archaeologists with firsthand knowledge and deep appreciation of each site gives voices to these silent ruins, bringing them to life as the bustling state-of-the-art metropolises they once were.

datafield.subfield: Nei Menggu Zizhiqu Chang Cheng zi yuan diao cha bao gao.
Nei Menggu Zizhiqu wen hua ting (wen wu ju), Nei Menggu Zizhiqu wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo bian zhu.

Ben shu chu bu jiang Nei Menggu Zizhiqu jing nei de Bei Wei Chang Cheng fei wei si tiao xian lu. Di yi tiao wei Taichang ba nian Chang Cheng, shi zhu yu Taichang ba nian (423) er yu, zhu yao xiu shan li yong le Qin Han Chang Cheng. Di er tiao wei Liuzhen Chang Cheng nan xian, zhu yao fen bu yu Yin Shan shan mai yi bei de Wulanchabu cao yuan. Di san tiao wei Liuzhen Chang Cheng bei xian, you dong xiang xi fen bu yu Siziwang Qi, Daerhanmaominglianghe Qi he Wuchuan Xian jing nei. Di si tiao wei Taihe chang qian, dong zi Hebei Sheng Fengning Man Zu Zizhixian shen ru Xilingulle Meng Duolun Xian, Zhenglan Qi jing nei, xiu zhu yu Taihe nian jian.
Nei Menggu wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo,
内蒙古自治区长城资源调查报告.
内蒙古自治区文化厅(文物局), 内蒙古自治区文物考古研究所编著.
本书初步将内蒙古自治区境内的北魏长城分为四条线路。第一条为泰常八年长城，始筑于泰常八年（423年）二月，主要修缮利用了秦汉长城。 第二条为六镇长城南线，主要分布于阴山山脉以北的乌兰察布草原。第三条为六镇长城北线，由东向西分布于四子王旗、达尔罕茂明安联合旗和武川县境内。第四条为太和长堑，东自河北省丰宁满族自治县伸入锡林郭勒盟多伦县、正蓝旗境内，修筑于太和年间。
内蒙古自治区文物考古研究所,

datafield.subfield: Hai shang si chou zhi lu =
Guo jia wen wu ju bian.

Ben ci zhan lan shi you Guo jia wen wu ju, Beijing Shi, Fujian Sheng ren ming zhen fu zhu ban, hui ji le yan hao di qu jiu ge sheng 51 jia bo wu guan de shu bai jian zhen pin. Zhe xie zhen gui de wen wu, shi Hai shang si chou zhi lu fen fu you jiu li shi yi liu de ji guang pian yu, shi zui zhi guan, zui zhen shi de li shi wen hua zheng ju.
Yuan dai de hai wai mao yi /
Ming dai Shi bo si zhi du de yan bian /
Hai shang si chou zhi lu yu Zhongguo gu chuan /
Zhen He xia Xiyang : yi wen hua ren yu wen ming jiao rong /
Shen mi de gan shu chuan bo shi /
Song Yuan shi qi hai shang si chou zhi lu de Quan Zhou wai xiao ci /
本次展览是由国家文物局，北京市，福建省人民政府主办，汇集了沿海地区九个省51家博物馆的数百件珍品。这些珍贵的文物, 是海上丝绸之路丰富悠久历史遗留的吉光片羽, 是最直观、最真实的历史文化证据。
明代市舶司制度的演变 /

宋元时期海上丝绸之路之路上的泉州外销瓷 /

呼伦贝尔民族文物考古大系.
Hulunbuir ethnic cultural relics and archaeology series. Oroqen Autonomous Banner /
主编中国社会科学院考古研究所, 中国社会科学院蒙古族源研究中心, 内蒙古自治区文物局, 内蒙古蒙古族源博物馆, 北京大学考古文博学院, 呼伦贝尔民族博物院.
本书通过系统整理、研究呼伦贝尔市各旗、县、区馆藏文物, 包括史前时期文物、历史时期文物、近现代及当代民族文物, 选择具有时代特征和民族风格的各类文物标本进行拍摄, 撰写文字说明, 依时代早晚顺序编排文物图片.
内蒙古蒙古族源博物馆,

Impact and mingling of agriculture and nomadism :
the exhibition of the general history of Ordos
Eerduosi bo wu guan chen lie zhan lan cong shu
Foreword also in English and Mongolian (Mongolian script).

Ben shu yi Eerduosi di qu ren lei li shi de fa zhan mai luo wei zhu xian, yi Eerduosi li shi shang ge zhong yao fa zhan jie duan li shi shi jian wei jie dian, ji zhong zhan xian le Eer duosidiqu de gu dai wen hua zai zhong xi wen hua, Zhongguo bei fang cao yuan wen hua, Zhonghua wu qian nian wen ming xing cheng yu fa zhan shi de zuo yong he di wei.quan shu fen wei "yuan gu sui yue", "wen ming qian ye", "cao yuan qing tong", "zhong xing hui ju", "tian jiao sheng di"wu ge bu fen.

鄂尔多斯通史陈列 = Impact and mingling of agriculture and nomadism : the exhibition of the general history of Ordos = Tariyalal negu̇del maljil, mȯrgu̇ldu̇l abcildul : Ordos-un nebterkei teu̇ke-yin delgen u̇jegu̇lu̇lge /
鄂尔多斯博物馆陈列展览丛书
本书以鄂尔多斯地区人类历史的发展脉络为主线, 以鄂尔多斯历史上各重要发展阶段历史事件为节点, 集中展现了鄂尔多斯地区的古代文化在中西文化, 中国北方草原文化, 中华五千年文明形成与发展史的作用和地位.全书分为"远古岁月", "文明前夜", "草原青铜", "众星汇聚", "天骄圣地"五个部分.
Eerduosi bo wu guan chen lie zhan lan cong shu.
鄂尔多斯博物馆陈列展览丛书.

本书为东北地区首次集中展示汉代墓葬的报告。 本报告共发表墓葬154座, 作者根据墓葬形制、随葬品组合以及形制特征，将这154座汉墓分为六期，时代由西汉早期至东汉晚期。大致反映了大连地区汉墓的概况。

datafield.subfield: Dunhuang wen wu yan jiu suo bian ; [she ying Peng Huashi ... et al.].
V. 1 is accompanied by a map: Mogao ku zong li mian tu.

Ben tao shu juan yi zhi juan wu fen bie shou lu Bei Liang zhi Bei Zhou shi qi (26 ge dong ku), Sui dai (49 ge dong ku), chu Tang zhi sheng Tang shi qi (38 ge dong ku), Tang dai (sheng Tang, zhong Tang, wan Tang 39 ge dong ku) he Wu Dai, Xi Xia, Song, Yuan dong ku de cai su he bi hua, yi ji you guan de lun wen deng.
Dunhuang wen wu yan jiu suo.
敦煌文物研究所编 ; [攝影 彭华士 ... et al.].
V. 1 is accompanied by a map: 莫高窟总立面图.
本套书卷一至卷五分别收录北凉至北周时期 (26个洞窟)， 隋代 (49个洞窟)， 初唐至盛唐时期 (38个洞窟)， 唐代 (盛唐, 中唐, 晚唐39个洞窟) 和五代 西夏， 宋，元 (49个洞窟) 的彩塑和壁画, 以及有关的论文等。

datafield.subfield: Tianjin Shi wen hua yi chan bao hu zhong xin bian zhu.
Tianjin wen hua yi chan bao hu cheng guo xi lie ;

Ben shu ji zhong shou ji le Tianjin Shi jin ji nian kao gu gong zuo de xin cheng guo, zhu yao yi yi zhi lei zi liao wei zhu. Qi zhong, ji bao kuo ji ben jian she zhong kao gu gong zuo suo ji lei de da liao zi liao, ye bao kuo yi xie chang nian ji ya de kao gu zi liao. Ben shu shi ji 1996 nian "Tianjin kao gu si shi nian zi liao hui bian" zhi hou, gen jia ke xue, xi tong de shou ji, zhan shi Tianjin Diqu jie duan xing kao gu cheng guo de wen ji, ji ke xue xing yu yan jiu xing yu yi ti, dui yu yan jiu Tianjin Shi de li shi wen hua ju you zhong yao de shi liao jia zhi he xue shu yi yi.
Tianjin Shi wen hua yi chan bao hu zhong xin,
天津市文化遗产保护中心编著.
天津文化遗产保护成果系列 ;
本书集中收集了天津市近几年考古工作的新成果, 主要以遗址类资料为主. 其中,既包括基本建设中考古工作所积累的大量资料,也包括一些长年积压的考古资料. 本书是继1996年"天津考古四十年资料汇编"之后,更加科学,系统的收集,展示天津地区阶段性考古成果的文集,集科学性与研究性于一体,对于研究天津市的历史文化具有重要的史料价值和学术意义.
天津市文化遗产保护中心,
Tianjin wen hua yi chan bao hu cheng guo xi lie ;
天津文化遗产保护成果系列 ;

datafield.subfield: Zhongguo guo jia bo wu guan tian ye kao gu yan jiu zhong xin ... [et al.] bian zhu.

Ben shu wei 2000 nian zhi 2003 tian ye kao gu gong zuo zong jie bao gao. Zong zuo di yi bu shi dui diao cha yu yi zhi qun xian guan de gu jian zhu ji zhi; di er bu shi dui ge xiang yi ji jin xing le ce liang ding wei, dui mo ya zao xiang qun, yuan diao shi xiang deng yi ji jin xing le ce hui ji lu he pai she, hui zhi le mo xian xiao guo tu, bing dui zao xiang qun he ti ke jin xing le ta pian de chui ta, jie guo jie shi chu Kongwangshan gu cheng shi yi zuo jian yu Nan Song shi qi de jun shi xing cheng bao, yu cheng quan nei fen bu de mo ya zao xiang qun, shi ke, jian zhu ji zhi deng zao qi yi ji wu guan.
Tian ye kao gu yan jiu zhong xin.
中国国家博物馆田野考古研究中心 ... [et al.] 编著.
本书为2000年至2003年田野考古工作总结报告。工作第一步是对调查与遗址群相关的古建筑遗址；第二步是对各项遗迹进行了测量定位，对摩崖造像群，圆雕石像等遗迹进行了测绘纪录和拍摄，绘制了墨线效果图，并对造像群和题刻进行拓片的捶拓，结果揭示出孔望山古城是一座建于南宋时期的军事性城堡，与城圈内分布的摩崖造像群，石刻，建筑基址等早期遗迹无关。

datafield.subfield: Bohai Shangjing cheng chu tu you tao /
Heilongjiang Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo Zhao Zhefu, Li Chenqi zhu.
Bohai Shangjing cheng chu tu you tao

Ben shu shi quan guo zhong dian wen wu bao hu dan wei Heilongjiang Sheng Ning'an Shi Tang dai Bo hai guo Shangjing Longquanfu yi zhi chu tu you tao qi jing hua tu lu, bing dui Bohai san cai de shi yong fan wei he fan ying chu de she hui xian xiang, Bohai san cai yu Tang san cai de yi tong, Bohai san cai de can di yu liu xiang zuo le chan shu.
Heilongjiang Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo.
黑龙江省文物考古研究所赵哲夫, 李陈奇著.
本书是全国重点文物保护单位黑龙江省宁安市唐代渤海国上京龙泉府遗址出土釉陶器精华的图录, 并对渤海三彩的使用范围和反映出的社会现象，渤海三彩与唐三彩的异同，渤海三彩的产地与流向作了阐述。
黑龙江省文物考古研究所.

datafield.subfield: The tomb of ruler Bai Zhongli Kingdom /
Anhui Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo, Bengbu Shi bo wu guan bian zhu ; zhu bian, Kan Xuhang.
Tomb of ruler Bai Zhongli Kingdom

Ben shu wei Anhui Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo yu Bengbu Shi bo wu guan zu cheng de kao gu fa jue dui dui Bengbu Shi Shuandun yi hao Chun Qiu mu jin xing kao gu fa jue. Chu tu tong qi, cai hui tao qi, yu shi qi deng wen wu 400 yu jian, huan you 2000 duo jain tu ou wen wu. Mu zhu shen feng wei Zhongliguo guo jun Bai. Ben bao gao wei yan jiu Zhongliguo de li shi, Zhongli wang shi xi, Huai Yi wen hua he di yu wen hua ti gong le bu ke duo de di zhen gui cai liao, tian bu le you guan Zhongliguo li shi de kong bai.
Anhui Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo,
The tomb of ruler Bai Zhongli Kingdom /
安徽省文物考古研究所, 蚌埠市博物馆编著 ; 主编, 阚绪杭.
本书由安徽省文物考古研究所与蚌埠市博物馆组成的考古发掘队对蚌埠市双墩一号春秋墓进行考古发掘. 出土铜器、彩绘陶器、玉石器等文物400余件, 还有2200多件土偶文物. 墓主身份为钟离国国君柏. 本报告为研究钟离国的历史、钟离王室世系, 淮夷文化和地域文化提供了不可多得的珍贵材料, 填补了有关钟离国历史的空白.
安徽省文物考古研究所,

Collection of papers from International Conference of Zooarchaeology in Zhengzhou, China, 2007

Ben shu zhu yao nei rong bao kuo 2007 nian 7 yue 14-16 ri, you Henan Sheng wen wu ju zhu ban, Henan Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo cheng ban, zai Zhengzhou cheng gong ju xing le "Dong wu kao gu guo ji xue shu yan tao hui". 2007年中国郑州动物考古国际学术研讨会论文集.
本书主要内容包括2007年7月14-16日，由河南省文物局主办，河南省文物考古研究所承办，在郑州成功举行了"动物考古国际学术研讨会"。来自美国，英国，澳大利亚，加拿大，日本以及中国的50多位专家，汇聚了西方知名的动物考古学家和几乎所有中国老中青动物考古学者。这本论文集收录的17篇文章就是这次会议的成果之一。

datafield.subfield: Xi'an Shi wen wu bao hu kao gu yan jiu yuan bian zhu ; Yang Junkai zhu = Shi jun tomb of the Northern Zhou dynasty / Xi'an Institute of Archaeology and Conservation on Cultural Heritage, Yang Junkai.
Shi jun tomb of the Northern Zhou dynasty

"Bei Zhou Shi jun mu wei yu jin Xi'an Shi Weiyang Qu Daminggong Xiang Jingshang Cun dong, xi ju Han Chang'an cheng yi zhi yue 6. 6 qian mi, nan ju Tang Da ming gong yi zhi yue 1.6 qian mi, yu bei Zhou Anga mu xiang ju yue 2.5 qian mi. 2003 nian 6-10 yue, Xi'an Shi wen wu bao hu kao gu suo dui gai mu jin xing le kao gu fa jue, chu tu liao shi men, shi tang, shi ta, jin jie zhi, jin bi he jin er huan deng shi fen zhen gui de wen wu. Suo chu tu de shi ke shang jun cai yong fu diao cai hui tie jin tu xiang zuo zhuang shi, tu xiang nei rong she ji xian jiao yi ji Zhong xi wen hua jiao liu deng ti cai. Ju shi tang shang de ming wen ji zai ke zhi, mu zhu shi jun wei bei Zhou Liangzhou sa bao. Gai mu de chu tu shi you guan Zhong xi fang wen hua jiao liu de you yi zhong yao kao gu fa xian"--From publisher.
Xi'an Shi wen wu bao hu kao gu yan jiu yuan,
西安市文物保护考古研究院编著 ; 杨军凯著 = Shi Jun tomb of the Northern Zhou dynasty / Xi'an Institute of Archaeology and Conservation on Cultural Heritage, Yang Junkai.

"北周史君墓位于今西安市未央区大明宮乡井上村东, 西距汉长安城遗址约6. 6千米, 南距唐大明宮遗址约1.6千米, 与北周安伽墓相距约2.5千米. 2003年6-10月, 西安市文物保护考古所对该墓进行了考古发掘, 出土了石门、石堂、石榻、金戒指、金币和金耳环等十分珍贵的文物. 所出土的石刻上均采用浮雕彩绘贴金图像做装饰, 图像内容涉及祆教以及中西文化交流等题材. 据石堂上的铭文记载可知, 墓主史君为北周凉州萨保. 该墓的出土是有关中西方文化交流的又一重要考古发现"--From publisher.
西安市文物保护考古研究院,

Ben bao gao quan mian, xi tong de jie shao le 48 zuo Han dai mu zang, zhe pi mu zang xing zhi duo yang, chu tu qi wu feng fu, shi dai cong Xi Han chu qi yan xu dao Dong Han chu qi. Panjialing ying wei go Jun Zhou cheng wai de yi chu ping min gong gong mu di. Ben bao gao wei yan jiu Er xi liang di qu Xi Han shi qi de zheng zhi, jing ji, sang zang xi su de fa zhan bian hua ji Han wen hua de chuan bo fa zhan ti gong le bu ke duo de de shi wu zi liao.
Nan shui bei diao zhong xian shui yuan you xian ze ren gong si,

湖北省文物局, 湖北省移民局, 南水北调中线水源有限责任公司编著 = The Panjialing cemetery site in Danjiangkou County, Hubei / Cultural Heritage Bureau of Hubei Province, Resettlement Bureau of Hubei Province, Mid-route Source of South-to-north Water Transfer Corp., Ltd.
南水北调中线一期工程文物保护项目. 湖北省考古发掘报告 =
Reports on the cultural relics conservation in the south-to-north water diversion project Hubei ;
本报告全面, 系统地介绍了48座汉代墓葬, 这批墓葬形制多样, 出土器物丰富, 时代从西汉初期延续到东汉初期. 潘家岭应为古均州城外的一处平民公共墓地.本报告为研究鄂两地区西汉时期的政治, 经济, 丧葬习俗的发展变化及汉文化的传播发展提供了不可多得的实物资料.
南水北调中线水源有限责任公司,
Nan shui bei diao zhong xian yi qi gong cheng wen wu bao hu xiang mu.
Hubei Sheng kao gu fa jue bao gao ;
南水北调中线一期工程文物保护项目.

datafield.subfield: Xiangyang Shi wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo bian zhu ; Wang Zhigang zhu bian.

Yugang mu di shi Hubei Xiangyang gu Dengcheng yi zhi wai wei de yi chu da xing mu di, 2004-2005 nian, Xiangyang Shi wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo wei pei he cheng shi jian she gui gai mu di jin xing le di san ci kao gu fa jue, gong fa jue mu zang 264 zuo, qi zhong 179 zuo Chu mu ji zhong, you xu de fen bu zai mu di de zhong bei bu. Ben shu dui zhe pi Chu mu zi liao jin xing le quan mian, xi tong de bao dao. Yugang Chu mu shi jian qi yu Chunqiu zhong qi wan duan, zhong Zhanguo zhong qi qian duan, qi jian wu que huan, er zhe yi shi duan zheng shi Chu wen hua de cheng shu he fan sheng qi. Yi ci dui yan jiu Chu wen hua xing cheng, fa zhan dao cheng shu, fan rong de guo cheng you zhe zhong yao de yi yi.
Xiangyang Shi wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo.
襄阳市文物考古研究所编著 ; 王志刚主编.

余岗墓地是湖北襄阳古邓城遗址外围的一处大型墓地，2004-2005年，襄阳市文物考古研究所为配合城市建设对该墓地进行了第三次考古发掘，共发掘墓葬264座，其中179座楚墓集中、有序地分布在墓地的中北部。本书对这批楚墓资料进行了全面、系统的报道。余岗楚墓埋葬时间起于春秋中期晚段，终于战国中期前段，其间无缺环，而这一时段正是楚文化的成熟和繁盛期。因此对研究楚文化从形成、发展到成熟、繁荣的过程有着重要的意义。
襄阳市文物考古研究所.

datafield.subfield: E pang gong kao gu fa xian yu yan jiu /
Zhongguo she hui ke xue yuan kao gu yan jiu suo, Xi'an Shi wen wu bao hu kao gu yan jiu yuan, Xi'an Shi Qin E pang gong yi zhi bao guan suo bian.

Ben shu hui ji le duo nian lai E pang gong wen ti kao gu he li shi yan jiu de xiang guan lun wen, bi jiao quan mian de fan ying le qi yan jiu zhuang kuang, dui yu jin hou de xiang guan yan jiu ju you zhi dao xing yi yi. Quan shu gong fen si bu fen, qi zhong kao gu fa xian bu fen shou lu le you guan E pang gong hou dang shi yu E pang gong you guan de kao gu jian bao yu bao gao, zong shu shi si pian. Zhuan ti yan jiu bu fen shou lu le you guan E pang gong ji qi fa xian de kao gu xue, li shi xue, wen xian xue yan jiu de dai biao xing lun wen er shi san pian, ci ai huan shou lu le "E pang gong fu" ji E pang gong yin yi you guan de wen zhang shi wu pian, yu E pang gong kao gu xiang guan de wen zhang shi si pian.
Zhongguo she hui ke xue yuan.
Xi'an Shi wen wu bao hu kao gu yan jiu yuan,
Xi'an Shi Qin E pang gong yi zhi bao guan suo,
阿房宮考古发现与研究 /
中国社会科学院考古研究所, 西安市文物保护考古研究院, 西安市秦阿房宮遗址保管所编.
本书汇集了多年来阿房宮问题考古和历史研究的相关论文，比较全面的反映了其研究状况，对于今后的相关研究具有指导性意义。全书共分四部分，其中考古发现部分收录了有关阿房宮或当时与阿房宮有光的考古简报与报告，综述十四篇。专题研究部分收录了有关阿房宮及其发现的考古学，历史学，文献学研究的代表性论文二十三篇，此外还收录了《阿房宮赋》及阿房宮音义有关的文章十五篇，与阿房宮考古相关的文章十四篇。
阿房宮 (西安市, 中国)
西安市文物保护考古研究院,
西安市秦阿房宮遗址保管所,

"成都文物考古研究所与茂县羌族博物馆等单位合作, 于2000年、2002年、2003年、2004年、2006年连续五次对茂县营盘山石棺葬墓地进行了考古发掘, 发掘了近200座墓葬, 出土了大量陶器及少量铜器等, 为研究岷江上游先秦时期石棺葬文化提供了很好实物资料"--From publisher.

datafield.subfield: Qianshan Linxin Zhan guo Qin Han mu /
Anhui Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo bian zhu.

"Qianshan Linxin zhang guo Qin Han mu" dui mu zang zi liao fei lei jie shao, dui mu zang fen qi, wen hua yin su, mu di xing zhi deng jin xing le yan jiu fen xi. Wei yan jiu Anhui Jianghuai xi bu di qu Zhang guo zhong wan qi zhi liang Han shi qi de li shi wen hua ti gong le yi pi zhong yao de shi wu zi liao, ye wei Zhan guo shi qi Anhui Diqu de Chu wen hua fen qu yan jiu ti gong le zhong yao xian suo.
Anhui Sheng wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo,
安徽省文物考古研究所编著.
《潜山林新战国秦汉墓》对墓葬资料分类介绍，对墓葬分期、文化因素、墓地性质等进行了研究分析。为研究安徽江淮西部地区战国中晚期至两汉时期的历史文化提供了一批重要的实物资料，也为战国时期安徽地区的楚文化分区研究提供了重要线索。
安徽省文物考古研究所,

datafield.subfield: Wu dai Wu Yue guo Kang ling =
The Kangling Mausoleum of the Wuyue Kingdom in the Five Dynasties Period /
Hangzhou Shi wen wu kao gu yan jiu suo, Lin'an Shi wen wu guan bian zhu.
Kangling Mausoleum of the Wuyue Kingdom in the Five Dynasties Period

"Wu dai Wu Yue guo Kangling" yi xu lun, mu zang jie gou, chu tu wen wu, cai ji yi wu, tao lun he ren shi deng pian zhang jie shi le wei yu Hangzhou Shi Linglongjie Daoxingli Cun Shangjietou zi ran cun de Wu Yue guo di er shi guo wang Yuanguan fu ren Ma shi mu (Kangling) de li shi, ke xue, yi shu jia zhi, ke guan de ji shu le Kangling fa xian yu fa jue, mu zang jie gou he zao xiang cai hui te se, sui zang wen wu de xing yu se bing jin er yan jiu le Qian shi jia zu mu de fen qi, wang shi sang zang li yi zhi du, tian wen xing xiang tu, mi se ci, yu qi deng wen ti.
Five dynasties and the Ten kingdoms, 907-979.
Hangzhou Shi wen wu kao gu suo,
The Kangling Mausoleum of the Wuyue Kingdom in the Five Dynasties Period /
杭州市文物考古研究所, 临安市文物馆编著.
《五代吴越国康陵》以绪论、墓葬结构、出土文物、采集遗物、讨论和认识等篇章揭示了位于杭州市玲珑街道祥里村上界头自然村的吴越国第二世国王钱元瓘夫人马氏墓（康陵）的历史、科学、艺术价值，客观地记述了康陵发现与发掘、墓葬结构和造像彩绘特色、随葬文物的形与色并进而研究了钱氏家族墓的分期、王室丧葬礼仪制度、天文星象图、秘色瓷、玉器等问题。
杭州市文物考古研究所,

Hulunbuir ethnic cultural relics and archaeology series.

zhu bian, Zhongguo she hui ke xue yuan kao gu yan jiu suo, Zhongguo she hui ke xue yuan Menggu zu yuan yan jiu zhong xin, Nei Menggu Zizhiqu wen wu ju, Nei Menggu Menggu zu yuan bo wu guan, Beijing da xue kao gu wen bo xue yuan, Hulunbei'er min zu bo wu yuan.

"Hulunbei'er min zu wen wu kao gu da xi" wei guo jia zhong dian xue ke xiang mu Minggu zu yuan you guan de wen wu, ci wei qi zhong yi juan. Zhu yao shou lu Chen Qi di qu xin shi qi zhi jin xian dai de min zu wen wu yue 300 jian. Ben shu nei rong bao kuo: xu yan, Chenbaer Qi min zu wen wu kao gu gai shi, tu ban, fu lu, hou ji.
Zhongguo she hui ke xue yuan.

Nei Menggu Menggu zu yuan bo wu guan,

Hulunbeier min zu bo wu yuan,
呼伦贝尔民族文物考古大系.
Hulunbuir ethnic cultural relics and archaeology series.
主编, 中国社会科学院考古研究所, 中国社会科学院蒙古族源研究中心, 内蒙古自治区文物局, 内蒙古蒙古族源博物馆, 北京大学考古文博学院, 呼伦贝尔民族博物院.
"呼伦贝尔民族文物考古大系"为国家重点学科项目蒙古族探源工程的成果，以行政区划分单元，同时成卷，共10卷，主要收录各地区与蒙古族源有关的文物，此为其中一卷。主要收录陈旗地区新石器至近现代的民族文物约300件。本书内容包括: 序言、陈巴尔虎旗民族文物考古概述、图版、附录、后记.
内蒙古蒙古族源博物馆,

"Khorasan, 'Lands of the East', refers to a regional toponym going back to the Sasanian era. In the early Islamic period, the term came to be used for a much larger area, reaching into Central Asia well beyond the Oxus, encompassing large parts of northern Afghanistan, and even extending to southeastern Iran. This volume brings together state-of-the-art researc on the history, geography, archaeology and the material culture of this vast region."--page [4] of cover.

中国东北原始文化考古论文集
本书为中国东北原始文化考古论文集, 全书共分为六大部分: 杨家洼新石器时代遗址考古发现与研究、红山文化、小河沿文化、夏家店下层文化、辽东地区洞穴青铜文化研究、战国墓葬与汉遗址.

100 new discoveries of the third nationwide surveys of cultural heritage /
本书介绍了在第三次全国文物普查中的100项新发现, 包括: 古遗址, 古墓葬, 古建筑, 石窟寺及石刻, 近现代重要史迹及代表性建筑等.
